content: the free pattern can be found *** here 1 *** crochet this beautiful baby blanket using delicate shell stitches with a crisp border this blanket has lovely texture and is a dream to work up note that the lion brand website classifies nuboo as a level 4 worsted weight yarn but it is much closer to a lightweight level 3 yarn similar to coboo or truboo you could interchange these yarns in this pattern 1 https //www allaboutami com/dainty-shells-baby-blanket/
